events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering based on relevant software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to move forward with the candidate's application.
The initial phone screening was conducted successfully, discussing the candidate's software engineering background.
The candidate responded enthusiastically, confirming availability and interest for the next interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview focused on software development and problem-solving skills for next week.
The candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding skills and knowledge of system design.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and compensation details with the candidate.
HR interview completed successfully with positive impressions regarding candidate's alignment with company values.
An official job offer was proposed outlining salary, benefits, and role responsibilities to the candidate.
Received positive feedback from the candidate expressing excitement about the offer and company culture.
The candidate accepted the job offer officially, confirming their commitment to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process has started, and the candidate is being introduced to engineering team tools and processes.
The recruitment case for the software engineer role is now closed with the successful hire onboarded.
